structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Warrants for payments from pension fund.
law.text: All moneys ordered to be paid from said pension fund to any person or persons shall be paid by the treasurer of the board of trustees only upon warrants signed by the president of said board and countersigned by the secretary thereof, and no warrant shall be drawn except by order of the board, after having been duly entered on the records of the proceedings of the board of trustees.
